20110120161137.000|20110120161139.000|TR0|ELIZABETH COHEN, CNN SR. MEDICAL 
20110120161139.000|20110120161142.000|TR0|CORRESPONDENT:  Oh, she's likely to face 
20110120161142.000|20110120161144.000|TR0|quite a bit of different kinds of therapy, 
20110120161144.000|20110120161147.000|TR0|and over a pretty long period of time.  As 
20110120161147.000|20110120161149.000|TR0|one doctor told us, this is a marathon, it 
20110120161149.000|20110120161152.000|TR0|is not a sprint.
20110120161152.000|20110120161155.000|TR0|
20110120161155.000|20110120161157.000|TR0|In fact, when she gets here, she won't 
20110120161157.000|20110120161200.000|TR0|even immediately go into the rehab 
20110120161200.000|20110120161202.000|TR0|hospital that you see here behind me.  
20110120161202.000|20110120161205.000|TR0|She'll be admitted to a regular hospital 
20110120161205.000|20110120161208.000|TR0|nearby to be assessed and to make sure 
20110120161208.000|20110120161210.000|TR0|that she's even ready for rehab.  So she 
20110120161210.000|20110120161213.000|TR0|has a lot of steps to go before they can 
20110120161213.000|20110120161215.000|TR0|start getting her on her way to hopefully 
20110120161215.000|20110120161218.000|TR0|being fully functional again.
20110120161218.000|20110120161220.000|TR0|
20110120161220.000|20110120161223.000|TR0|COSTELLO:  So tell us why Houston, why 
20110120161223.000|20110120161226.000|TR0|this facility.
20110120161226.000|20110120161228.000|TR0|
20110120161228.000|20110120161231.000|TR0|COHEN:  This facility is really known for 
20110120161231.000|20110120161233.000|TR0|the work that it does with brain injuries, 
20110120161233.000|20110120161236.000|TR0|Carol.  Plus, it is near where her husband 
20110120161236.000|20110120161239.000|TR0|works over at NASA.  So I imagine that 
20110120161239.000|20110120161241.000|TR0|those are the two things that went into it.
20110120161241.000|20110120161244.000|TR0|
20110120161244.000|20110120161246.000|TR0|What they're really known for is looking 
20110120161246.000|20110120161249.000|TR0|at all the different parts of the person

20110120161302.000|20110120161304.000|TR0|All these things that we take for granted.
20110120161304.000|20110120161307.000|TR0|

20110120161312.000|20110120161315.000|TR0|brain has an injury, sometimes the person

20110120161356.000|20110120161359.000|TR0|
20110120161359.000|20110120161401.000|TR0|ERIC HOLDER, U.S. ATTORNEY GENERAL:  -- 
20110120161401.000|20110120161404.000|TR0|families have been charged, including 
20110120161404.000|20110120161406.000|TR0|defendants from all five New York-based 
20110120161406.000|20110120161409.000|TR0|families: the Bonanno, Colombo, Gambino, 
20110120161409.000|20110120161412.000|TR0|Genovese and Lucchese families.  We have 
20110120161412.000|20110120161414.000|TR0|charged mob associates and mob bosses 
20110120161414.000|20110120161417.000|TR0|alike, including the boss of La Cosa 
20110120161417.000|20110120161419.000|TR0|Nostra operations in New England; the 
20110120161419.000|20110120161422.000|TR0|street boss, acting underboss and 
20110120161422.000|20110120161425.000|TR0|consigliare of the Colombo family; and the 
20110120161425.000|20110120161427.000|TR0|Gambino family consigliare and a member of 
20110120161427.000|20110120161430.000|TR0|that family's ruling panel.
20110120161430.000|20110120161432.000|TR0|
20110120161432.000|20110120161435.000|TR0|Their alleged crimes include numerous 
20110120161435.000|20110120161437.000|TR0|violent and illegal acts from murder and 
20110120161437.000|20110120161440.000|TR0|narcotics trafficking, to extortion, 
20110120161440.000|20110120161443.000|TR0|illegal gambling, arson, loan-sharking, 
20110120161443.000|20110120161445.000|TR0|and labor racketeering.  Now, some 
20110120161445.000|20110120161448.000|TR0|allegations involve classic mob hits to 
20110120161448.000|20110120161450.000|TR0|eliminate perceived rivals.  Others 
20110120161450.000|20110120161453.000|TR0|involve truly senseless murders.
20110120161453.000|20110120161456.000|TR0|
20110120161456.000|20110120161458.000|TR0|In one instant, a victim was allegedly 
20110120161458.000|20110120161501.000|TR0|shot and killed during a botched robbery 
20110120161501.000|20110120161503.000|TR0|attempt, and two other murder victims 
20110120161503.000|20110120161506.000|TR0|allegedly were shot in a public bar 
20110120161506.000|20110120161508.000|TR0|because of a dispute over a spilled drink. 
20110120161508.000|20110120161511.000|TR0| Other charged criminal activity reflects 
20110120161511.000|20110120161514.000|TR0|the Mafia's continued influence in various 
20110120161514.000|20110120161516.000|TR0|economic sectors, and its alleged schemes 
20110120161516.000|20110120161519.000|TR0|to steal money by preying on vulnerable 
20110120161519.000|20110120161521.000|TR0|Americans.
20110120161521.000|20110120161524.000|TR0|
20110120161524.000|20110120161527.000|TR0|One fraud scream carried about the Colombo 
20110120161527.000|20110120161529.000|TR0|crime family alleged defrauded consumers 
20110120161529.000|20110120161532.000|TR0|with poor credit histories out of one-time 
20110120161532.000|20110120161534.000|TR0|payments that the consumers believed they 
20110120161534.000|20110120161537.000|TR0|were making to secure loans. Other charges 
20110120161537.000|20110120161539.000|TR0|allege that the crime families extorted 
20110120161539.000|20110120161542.000|TR0|money from various labor union members, 
20110120161542.000|20110120161545.000|TR0|including local chapters, local unions of 
20110120161545.000|20110120161547.000|TR0|the International Longshoreman's 
20110120161547.000|20110120161550.000|TR0|Association and a concrete union here in 
20110120161550.000|20110120161552.000|TR0|New York.
20110120161552.000|20110120161555.000|TR0|
20110120161555.000|20110120161558.000|TR0|Now, today's arrests mark an important and 
20110120161558.000|20110120161600.000|TR0|encouraging step forward in disrupting La 
20110120161600.000|20110120161603.000|TR0|Cosa Nostra's operations, but the reality 
20110120161603.000|20110120161605.000|TR0|is that our battle against organized crime 
20110120161605.000|20110120161608.000|TR0|enterprises is far from over. This is an 
20110120161608.000|20110120161610.000|TR0|ongoing effort, and it must and will 
20110120161610.000|20110120161613.000|TR0|remain a top priority for all of us in law 
20110120161613.000|20110120161616.000|TR0|enforcement.
20110120161616.000|20110120161618.000|TR0|
20110120161618.000|20110120161621.000|TR0|Members and associates of La Cosa Nostra 
20110120161621.000|20110120161623.000|TR0|are among the most dangerous criminals in 
20110120161623.000|20110120161626.000|TR0|our country.  The very oath of allegiance 
20110120161626.000|20110120161629.000|TR0|sworn by these Mafia members during their 
20110120161629.000|20110120161631.000|TR0|initiation ceremony binds them to a life 
20110120161631.000|20110120161634.000|TR0|of crime.
20110120161634.000|20110120161636.000|TR0|
20110120161636.000|20110120161639.000|TR0|Now, as we've seen for decades, criminal 
20110120161639.000|20110120161641.000|TR0|Mafia operations can negatively impact our 
20110120161641.000|20110120161644.000|TR0|economy, not only through a wide variety 
20110120161644.000|20110120161647.000|TR0|of fraud schemes, but also through the 
20110120161647.000|20110120161649.000|TR0|illegal imposition of what in essence are 
20110120161649.000|20110120161652.000|TR0|mob taxes at our ports, in our 
20110120161652.000|20110120161654.000|TR0|construction industries, and in our small 
20110120161654.000|20110120161657.000|TR0|businesses.  In some cases, La Cosa Nostra 
20110120161657.000|20110120161700.000|TR0|members and associates allegedly seek to 
20110120161700.000|20110120161702.000|TR0|corrupt legitimate businesses and those 
20110120161702.000|20110120161705.000|TR0|who have sworn to uphold the public trust. 
20110120161705.000|20110120161707.000|TR0| And many of them are lethal.  Time and 
20110120161707.000|20110120161710.000|TR0|again, they have shown a willingness to 
20110120161710.000|20110120161713.000|TR0|kill to make money, to eliminate rivals 
20110120161713.000|20110120161715.000|TR0|and to silence witnesses.
20110120161715.000|20110120161718.000|TR0|
20110120161718.000|20110120161720.000|TR0|Now, today's successful arrests across 
20110120161720.000|20110120161723.000|TR0|multiple cities and involving multiple 
20110120161723.000|20110120161725.000|TR0|Mafia families sends a clear message that 
20110120161725.000|20110120161728.000|TR0|in our fight against organized crime, the 
20110120161728.000|20110120161731.000|TR0|Justice Department is targeting federal 
20110120161731.000|20110120161733.000|TR0|resources and working with our state and 
20110120161733.000|20110120161736.000|TR0|local law enforcement partners like never 
20110120161736.000|20110120161738.000|TR0|before.  We are committed and we are 
20110120161738.000|20110120161741.000|TR0|determined to eradicate these criminal 
20110120161741.000|20110120161744.000|TR0|enterprises once and for all, and to bring 
20110120161744.000|20110120161746.000|TR0|their members to justice.
20110120161746.000|20110120161749.000|TR0|
20110120161749.000|20110120161751.000|TR0|Now, as part of our commitment to battling 
20110120161751.000|20110120161754.000|TR0|organized crime, the Justice Department's 
20110120161754.000|20110120161756.000|TR0|criminal division, headed by Lanny Breuer,

20110120161809.000|20110120161812.000|TR0|knowledge and experience in combating 
20110120161812.000|20110120161815.000|TR0|criminal enterprises.  In addition, due to

20110120161817.000|20110120161820.000|TR0|organizations pose, in September of last 
20110120161820.000|20110120161822.000|TR0|year, I issued annual an order directing

20110120161825.000|20110120161827.000|TR0|States attorney's offices, and the FBI to

20110120162411.000|20110120162414.000|TR0|Carlina Ray (ph) White was taken to the 
20110120162414.000|20110120162416.000|TR0|hospital by her mother, admitted for

20110120162432.000|20110120162434.000|TR0|

20110120164645.000|20110120164648.000|TR0|Harry, I was reading an interview the

20110120164711.000|20110120164714.000|TR0|BELAFONTE:  Well, in this next generation, 
20110120164714.000|20110120164716.000|TR0|so much of that which we have gained 
20110120164716.000|20110120164719.000|TR0|seemed to have lost its way.  Young people 
20110120164719.000|20110120164722.000|TR0|didn't quite pick up the baton.  Everybody 
20110120164722.000|20110120164724.000|TR0|was drifting.  It became a very selfish 
20110120164724.000|20110120164727.000|TR0|me-service kind of generation.
20110120164727.000|20110120164729.000|TR0|
20110120164729.000|20110120164732.000|TR0|And I had just finished having a meeting 
20110120164732.000|20110120164735.000|TR0|with Nelson Mandela, a man for whom I have 
20110120164735.000|20110120164737.000|TR0|great respect.  And I had been visiting 
20110120164737.000|20110120164740.000|TR0|with him. And he and I were reminiscing on 
20110120164740.000|20110120164742.000|TR0|whether or not we felt we had missed the 
20110120164742.000|20110120164745.000|TR0|boat somewhere in what we had done in our 
20110120164745.000|20110120164747.000|TR0|lives.  And in that conversation, which is 
20110120164747.000|20110120164750.000|TR0|in the film, he pointed out that we did 
20110120164750.000|20110120164753.000|TR0|not quite touch all the bells we should 
20110120164753.000|20110120164755.000|TR0|have touched.  And that made me feel sad 
20110120164755.000|20110120164758.000|TR0|to hear him say that.
20110120164758.000|20110120164800.000|TR0|
20110120164800.000|20110120164803.000|TR0|ANDERSON:  Well, you're not a sad guy, 
20110120164803.000|20110120164806.000|TR0|though.  You've said you live your life in 
20110120164806.000|20110120164808.000|TR0|a perpetual state of optimism.  Why is 
20110120164808.000|20110120164811.000|TR0|that constant state of positivity so 
20110120164811.000|20110120164813.000|TR0|important especially in today's world?
20110120164813.000|20110120164816.000|TR0|
20110120164816.000|20110120164818.000|TR0|BELAFONTE:  I think if you look at the 
20110120164818.000|20110120164821.000|TR0|universe, you look at the planet, you look 
20110120164821.000|20110120164824.000|TR0|at living things, there's a miracle here 
20110120164824.000|20110120164826.000|TR0|that's just unbelievable.  To be able to 
20110120164826.000|20110120164829.000|TR0|greet it every day of one's life is in 
20110120164829.000|20110120164831.000|TR0|itself its own joy.
20110120164831.000|20110120164834.000|TR0|
20110120164834.000|20110120164837.000|TR0|And I just always felt that I have an 
20110120164837.000|20110120164839.000|TR0|obligation to do something about making 
20110120164839.000|20110120164842.000|TR0|that happen.  And one of the biggest 
20110120164842.000|20110120164844.000|TR0|obligations was to pass the baton on to 
20110120164844.000|20110120164847.000|TR0|the younger generations so that they would 
20110120164847.000|20110120164849.000|TR0|know what history they came from so they 
20110120164849.000|20110120164852.000|TR0|could make decisions about the history 
20110120164852.000|20110120164855.000|TR0|they must build on.
20110120164855.000|20110120164857.000|TR0|
20110120164857.000|20110120164900.000|TR0|ANDERSON:  And very quickly, Gina, why was 
20110120164900.000|20110120164902.000|TR0|it so important for you to preserve your 
20110120164902.000|20110120164905.000|TR0|father's legacy with this movie?
20110120164905.000|20110120164908.000|TR0|
20110120164908.000|20110120164910.000|TR0|GINA BELAFONTE, PRODUCER:  Well, very much 
20110120164910.000|20110120164913.000|TR0|about like what he just said.  You know, I 
20110120164913.000|20110120164915.000|TR0|think that artists and activism is an 
20110120164915.000|20110120164918.000|TR0|important legacy to uphold.  And I think 
20110120164918.000|20110120164920.000|TR0|that in many ways he has passed the baton
